data.title: Kimes Ranch Men's Colt Black/Army Jacket
data.meta_description: Gavel Western Wear is your source for all western clothing, hats and accessories.  We carry all the Western brands such as Stetson, Resistol, and Wrangler.
data.text:
Our Guarantee

At Gavel Western Wear, our guarantee is simple: We want every one of our customers to be completely satisfied. So we always strive to do the right thing. If you are unhappy with your purchase, simply return it within 30 days for a refund, credit, or exchange. Our hassle-free customer care department promises to always treat you with honesty and fairness.

Merchandise must be in as-new condition (with tags, unwashed, unworn). In the same condition as received.

Boots may be exchanged or returned only if the soles are unscratched and the boots are in as-new condition. When trying on boots, be sure to walk in carpeted areas until you are sure that your boots fit correctly.

Please note that there are some items for which we cannot accept returns unless the product is defective:

Customized or personalized items

Final Clearance items

Returns and Exchanges

If for any reason you need a return or exchange simply call us at 956-544-0798 to handle your return. You are responsible for the return shipping fees unless otherwise noted in product listing and welcomed to return via the carrier of your choice. Upon receiving and inspecting product we will gladly issue a refund for the product purchase price or exchange item if needed.

Please address your package to:

Gavel Western Wear

2921 Boca Chica Blvd. Suite #6

Brownsville, TX. 78521

*All products displaying this logo qualify for Free Shipping and Free Return Shipping if within the Continental United States. Please call us to request you return label.*
